sentences.en: A master repairman pointed out how imperfections had worn into the banjo.
sentences.cn: 有位修琴大师告诉我,一些小瑕疵已经影响到琴的状态了.

sentences.en: A method for manufacturing a banjo type drive axle housing for a motor vehicle is disclosed.
sentences.cn: 有一种方法制造班卓琴型驱动桥壳的汽车披露.

sentences.en: Baldwin said: "I don't play the banjo but I'm thrilled to be hosting the Oscars – it's the opportunity of a lifetime."
sentences.cn: 鲍德温说：“我虽然不会弹班卓琴，但是能主持奥斯卡，我高兴极了，这是一生中难得的一次机会。”

sentences.en: Before he began to play, Harry tuned up his banjo.
sentences.cn: 开始演奏前, 哈利先行调好他的班卓琴.

sentences.en: He could hear the thrum of a banjo.
sentences.cn: 窗外传来吉他的漫弹声.

sentences.en: His virtuosity on a $ 5 , 000 banjo won consistent applause.
sentences.cn: 他弹奏一只价值五千美元的班卓琴的技艺受到了异口同声的称赞.

sentences.en: I come from Alabama, with banjo on my knee.
sentences.cn: 我来自阿拉巴马, 身上带着五弦琴.

sentences.en: The banjo had a long neck.
The crowd cheered as Premier Wayne Goss unveiled a lifesize statue of poet Banjo Paterson.
sentences.cn: 韦恩·戈斯州长揭开诗人巴尼奥·佩特森的等身塑像时，人群欢呼起来。

sentences.en: The movie has a chirpy soundtrack of pedal organ and banjo.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的配乐是由带脚键盘的管风琴和班卓琴奏出的轻快乐曲.

sentences.en: Then Banjo's health began to deteriorate.
sentences.cn: 后来它的健康开始恶化.

sentences.en: This shamisen, originating in Okinawa, is a banjo-like three-stringed instrument that is played with a plectrum.
sentences.cn: 这种三味弦起源于冲绳群岛，是一种像班卓琴那样的用琴拨弹奏的三弦乐器。

sentences.en: With a few pluck at the string of his banjo, everybodyis singing along.
sentences.cn: 他拨了拨班卓琴的琴弦, 每个人就都跟著唱了起了.

sentences.en: With a few plucks at the strings of his banjo, everybody was singing along.
sentences.cn: 他拨了拨班卓琴的琴弦, 每个人就都跟着唱了起了.

sentences.en: Yao is not a cowboy or a banjo lover.
sentences.cn: 姚明不是牛仔,也不是乡村歌曲爱好者.

sentences.en: You know , if I could just play the banjo better, y'all would be eating steaks.
sentences.cn: 如果我能把班卓琴弹得更好, 你们都可以吃到牛排了.

trans.tran_en: a musical instrument like a guitar, with a round body and four or more strings, played especially in  country and western  music
